alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 7:17PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALL... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 717 PM MDT, a snow squall was 14 miles north of Fruita, or 20 miles north of Grand Junction moving east at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Grand Junction, Fruita, Palisade, De Beque, Loma, Cameo, Mack, Fruitvale and Clifton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 8 and 16, near mile marker 31, and between mile markers 34 and 66. Colorado 65 between mile markers 53 and 61. Colorado 139 between mile markers 1 and 39. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
